summary: DT  A DEFECTIVE  2.7 LITER ENGINE.  IT HAD SLUDGE BUILD UP AND IT CAUSED THE MOTOR TO BLOW OUT.  THE FIRST TIME IT  HAPPENED WAS IN JUNE 2005,  AND THE SECOND TIME ON SEPTEMBER 9, 2005. THE MOTOR WAS MAKING A TAPPING SOUND, BUT THE CYLINDER HAD BROKEN INSIDE THE BLOCK, AND IT WAS FLAPPING UP AND DOWN. THE DEALER SAID  THE WATER PUMP WAS BAD, AND  THE CONSUMER WOULD HAVE TO PAY FOR THE MOTOR.  *AK
